name: Remove the Notification Bell
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Die Notification Bell, die. Compatible with other MyAnimeList Stylish themes. Install to remove the notification bell at the top of forum, club, and profile pages. See below for howto recolor the bell or only remove select phases.
additional_info:
Recolor and remove certain phases of the bell instead: 
https://userstyles.org/styles/123389/myanimelist-recolor-remove-notification-bells
